short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn more effectively and efficiently by optimizing your browsing with Tidalic. THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tidalic helps knowledge workers learn more effectively and efficiently by putting time management at the centre of learning.

New in this version:
* PDF support
* Outlook support
* Bug fixes

Say goodbye to scattered bookmarks and overwhelming tabs. Tidalic's adaptive scheduling feature seamlessly integrates your content consumption into your daily calendar, ensuring you never miss a learning opportunity.

Self-driven learning activities are prioritised based on alignment with organisational and team goals, ensuring maximum impact on time spent.

For students: Elevate your study impact by organizing your reading material around your class and social schedule. See the bigger picture, see the links between your courses.

For professionals: Align your learning objectives with your business objectives. Stay ahead in your field by fitting in learning sessions amidst your busy workweek.
